summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Entity Profile pages feature. All core functionality working correctly including search, navigation, profile display, charts, and export features.

minor_issues.issue: Export endpoints return binary Excel data which cannot be parsed as JSON in tests
minor_issues.impact: Test parsing error only - actual functionality works correctly

passed_tests: Demo credentials removed from login page
Entity search API returns states/dealers/cities/employees correctly
Entity profile API returns complete KPIs and charts data
Search dropdown shows entities with proper structure
Clicking entity navigates to correct /profile/:entityType/:entityId URL
Profile page displays all KPI cards (Total, Open, Won, Lost, Conversion, Avg Age, Avg Close)
Profile page displays pie chart for lead stage breakdown
Profile page displays line chart for trend over time
Profile page displays additional charts (Lead Source Distribution, Segment Performance)
Profile page displays sub-entity performance tables (Top Dealers/Employees)
Export Data button is functional and clickable
Breadcrumb navigation works correctly (Dashboard > State > Dealer hierarchy)
Clicking sub-entity rows navigates to that entity's profile
Search functionality works from profile pages
Follow-up Status section shows overdue and on-track counts
Recent Leads section displays with proper pagination structure
